definition: to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
residential surveillance, a form of noncustodial house arrest

sentences.english: They climb walls, leap off buildings and spy on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 它们会爬墙，能跳下大楼，还能暗中监视敌人。

sentences.english: Tell no one, she says to him in her note, they are watching.
sentences.chinese: 她在邮件里说，别告诉任何人，他们正在监视你。

sentences.english: You should constantly monitor the cost of development and check for cost overrun.
sentences.chinese: 应该不断地监视开发的成本以防成本超出预算。

sentences.english: And surveillance infrastructure can be exported, which also aids totalitarianism around the world.
sentences.chinese: 监视设施可以出口，这也助长了世界上的极权主义。

sentences.english: AnShan tiger surveillance to meet with dao Yin CuiGuoHuan confidential and report to RenHui.
sentences.chinese: 安善虎监视到道贤跟崔国焕机密见面，汇报给仁惠。

sentences.english: In theory, Whitehall officials and ministers back in London oversaw the empire.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上说，伦敦白厅官员与部长们监视帝国运作。

sentences.english: Monitor took the plane crashed into the Pentagon .
sentences.chinese: 监视器拍下飞机撞进五角大厦的瞬间。

sentences.english: She was policed by her husband's cops.
sentences.chinese: 她被丈夫雇用的警察所监视。

sentences.english: They watched him closely in cottom he should escape.
sentences.chinese: 他们严密监视他，恐怕他会逃脱。

sentences.english: The proxy service monitors the status of each job that has been submitted.
sentences.chinese: 代理服务监视已提交的每个作业的状态。

sentences.english: Assemblies provide additional monitoring points at the component interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 程序集在组件接口上提供了额外的监视点。

sentences.english: Position child with head of bed slightly elevated to decrease cerebral edema; monitor administration of fluids.
sentences.chinese: 卧床时，床头略微抬高，减少脑水肿，监视补液情况。

sentences.english: Typical applications include stream processing of high resolution images for deployed airborne surveillance.
sentences.chinese: 其典型应用包括空中监视高清晰度图像的流处理。

sentences.english: The hook procedure monitors these messages for all applications in the system.
sentences.chinese: 该钩子子程为系统中所有的应用程序监视这些消息。

sentences.english: After the sun followed watching him.
sentences.chinese: 之后，孙磊尾随着监视他的举动。

definition: to warn/to alert/to be on the alert/to stand guard/sentinel
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to patrol/to make a tour/to inspect/to scan with one's eyes
